books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.author: J. K. Rowling.
books.description: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School for Wizards and Witches

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.author: J. K. Rowling
books.description:
The Dursleys were so mean and hideous that summer that all Harry Potter wanted was to get back to the Hogwarts School for Witchcraft and Wizardry. But just as he's packing his bags, Harry receives a warning from a strange, impish creature named Dobby who says that if Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts, disaster will strike

And strike it does. For in Harry's second year at Hogwarts, fresh torments and horrors arise, including an outrageously stuck-up new professor, Gilderoy Lockhart, a spirit named Moaning Myrtle who haunts the girls' bathroom, and the unwanted attentions of Ron Weasley's younger sister, Ginny.

But each of these seem minor annoyances when the real trouble begins, and someone -- or something -- starts turning Hogwarts students to stone. Could it be Draco Malfoy, a more poisonous rival than ever? Could it possibly be Hagrid, whose mysterious past is finally told? Or could it be the one everyone at Hogwarts most suspects . . . Harry Potter himself?
(Front flap)

books.title: Alexander and the terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day
books.author: Judith Viorst ; illustrated by Ray Cruz.
books.description: On a day when everything goes wrong for him, Alexander is consoled by the thought that other people have bad days too.

books.title: Frindle
books.publisher: Simon & Schuster Books for Young Readers
books.author: Andrew Clements ; pictures by Brian Selznick.
books.description: When he decides to turn his fifth grade teacher's love of the dictionary around on her, clever Nick Allen invents a new word and begins a chain of events that quickly moves beyond his control.

books.title: Gregor the Overlander
books.author: Suzanne Collins.
books.description: When eleven-year-old Gregor and his two-year-old sister are pulled into a strange underground world, they trigger an epic battle involving men, bats, rats, cockroaches, and spiders while on a quest foretold by ancient prophecy.

staff.name: Naftali Kulik
staff.title: Chief Book Wyrm
staff.bio: Naftali has been an enthusiastic Book Wyrm his entire life. He has read a wide variety of books covering many different genres, but sci-fi/fantasy has always been his first choice. He has aspirations of perhaps becoming a writer himself one day and in the past has resolved to try his hand at writing when he has some time, which is to say, never. His current pursuit of a career in software engineering has effectively put the nail in the proverbial coffin of that particular endeavor. Don't tell him we said this, but we at Book Wyrms think he's probably a better developer than writer anyway, so it's all for the best as they say.
